WECHATY_PUPPET.description: Wechaty Puppet Name, Default: `wechaty-puppet-puppeteer`. Learn more at: <https://github.com/Chatie/wechaty/wiki/Puppet>

WECHATY_NAME.description: Wechaty Name Used to Store Memory

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Amazon S3 accessKeyId for Bot Memory

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Amazon S3 secretAccessKey for Bot Memory

AWS_REGION.description: Amazon S3 Region for Bot Memory

AWS_S3_BUCKET.description: Amazon S3 Bucket for Bot Memory
